sources.title: Press Release: Final Environmental Impact Report Issued ... - Cadiz, Inc.
sources.snippet: The Cadiz Project will provide a new, reliable water supply for approximately 400,000 Southern Californians by capturing and conserving groundwater that will otherwise be lost to evaporation from a vast aquifer system beneath private property owned by Cadiz Inc. in California's Mojave Desert.
